Package com.openclassroom.safetynet.controller

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
com.openclassroom.safetynet.controller.SearchController
@RestController public class SearchController extends Object
Endpoints, which enables searches This controller provides various endpoints to retrieve information about persons, their medical records, fire stations, and community-related data.

    • getPersonsByStationNumber

      @GetMapping("/firestation") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PersonCoveredByStation> getPersonsByStationNumber(@RequestParam @Validated @Positive @jakarta.validation.constraints.Positive int stationNumber)
      Retrieves all persons covered by a given fire station number.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The station number to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a PersonCoveredByStation object, which includes the list of persons covered by the specified fire station.

    • getAllChild

      @GetMapping("/childAlert") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Child>> getAllChild(@RequestParam @Validated @NotBlank @NotBlank String address)
      Retrieves a list of children living at a specific address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to search for children.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of Child objects representing the children living at the specified address.

    • getPersonsPhoneNumbersByStationNumber

      @GetMapping("/phoneAlert") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getPersonsPhoneNumbersByStationNumber(@RequestParam("firestation") @Validated @NotNull @Min(1L) @jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull,@jakarta.validation.constraints.Min(1L) int stationNumber)
      Retrieves a list of phone numbers of persons covered by a specific fire station number.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The fire station number to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of phone numbers of persons covered by the specified fire station.

    • getListOfPersonsInfoAndStationNumberByAddress

      @GetMapping("/fire") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PersonsAndStationInfo> getListOfPersonsInfoAndStationNumberByAddress(@RequestParam @Validated @NotBlank @NotBlank String address)
      Retrieves resident information and the fire station number associated with a given address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a PersonsAndStationInfo object, which includes both the persons' information and the associated fire station number.

    • getListOfPersonsInfoAndStationNumberByStationNumber

      @GetMapping("/flood/stations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PersonFloodInfo> getListOfPersonsInfoAndStationNumberByStationNumber(@RequestParam("stations") @Validated List<@Positive Integer> stationNumber)
      Retrieves resident information for multiple fire stations based on a list of station numbers.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The list of fire station numbers to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a PersonFloodInfo object, which includes the list of persons and their medical records for the given stations.

    • getPersonsFullInfoWithLastName

      @GetMapping("/personInfolastName") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PersonsLastNameInfo>> getPersonsFullInfoWithLastName(@RequestParam @Validated @NotBlank @NotBlank String lastName)
      Retrieves full resident information by last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name of the resident(s) to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of PersonsLastNameInfo objects, which includes full information and medical records for residents with the specified last name.

    • getMailByCity

      @GetMapping("/communityEmail") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<String>> getMailByCity(@RequestParam @Validated @NotBlank @NotBlank String city)
      Retrieves a list of community email addresses for residents of a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city to search for.
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of email addresses of the residents in the specified city.
